TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InfoPathNamespaceAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class InfoPathNamespaceAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class InfoPathNamespaceAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary: Apply this attribute to specify the namespace prefixes that are used in the class that contains form code in a managed-code project.

remarks.para: Important: This attribute and its settings are generated automatically when you create and work with an InfoPath managed-code form template using the InfoPath 2003 object model. You should not alter this attribute. For more information, see How to: Create a Managed Code Form Template Using the InfoPath 2003 Object Model.

Docs.summary: This member is reserved for internal use and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ UserNamespace { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.UserNamespace : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the namespace prefixes in the attribute that is applied to the class that contains form code in a managed-code project.

remarks.para: Important: The settings of the InfoPathNamespace attribute are generated automatically when you create and work with an InfoPath managed-code form template using the InfoPath 2003 object model. You should not alter this attribute. For more information, see How to: Create a Managed Code Form Template Using the InfoPath 2003 Object Model.
